channel.title: Realm of Heroes V1 [Pets, Dungeoneering, +More!] [PI]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/realmofheroesbanner1.jpg[/img]
Hello, and welcome to the release of Realm of Heroes!
The base is Project Insanity/DSPK. I used my War on Camelot as a source. [/center] [b]Things from previous release:[/b] •Has a lot of bosses •Clue scrolls •Gambling •New items, eg. Dragon Masks •508+ graphics, anims, objects, etc •The BEST skilling zone, imo. Worked on it a lot. •A pure pk zone, where you need 45 defence or less to enter •An herblore quest to start herblore, isn't finished
[b]New features:[/b] •Pets •Great dungeoneering minigame/skill, has the following: •Good Interface •Portals that you can fail to pass and get hurt damage •Kill monsters to get keys to put in various chests •Different bosses depending on your dungeoneering level (Note i've only added bosses for up to level 35, which is around 5 bosses) •Dungeonering tokens you can use to buy dungeoneering armours and weapons •Depending on the boss you fight you get a certain amount of experience and tokens •Unique home that is rarely used •Shapeshifting base (Click mage set inside the pk tab)
•+much more, you'll just have to see for yourself.
[center][size=28pt][b]Media[/b][/size]
[size=20pt]Old Pictures:[/size]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammypurepkzone.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammysomearmourspecs.jpg[/img]

[b][size=20pt]New Pictures:[/size][/b]

[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/realmofheroeshome.jpg[/img]
[b]Credits[/b] -Sanity -$The True Killer$ from R-S -Graham -Wl -Dakkia/Dakia? -LmcTruck -Hazey/Hazely?[/center]
Package (Server and Client): http://up.ht/lmhTP8 http://www.mediafire.com/?t0be448wot3to98
Cache: http://up.ht/icKEXr http://www.mediafire.com/?5tbxa9pu6h11jnb
Just put the cache into your (C:)
If you need any help, just reply to this thread and I'll help you as soon as possible. :P
Incase you were wondering, V2 will be coming out in a few weeks, maybe a month.

I watched Spikey program this over TeamView, because this was the source he was going to use for his server.

And guess what he did?

Loser2read… get the hell off my thread.
